name: ExcuseMaker
0:
”Alexa open excuse maker.”
”New excuse.”
”What's my excuse.”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: excuse maker
des: This is a skill that gives you random excuses to keep you from doing things. To open the skill, just say "Alexa, open excuse maker" and Alexa will give you an excuse.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
